cyclone.name: HANNA
cyclone.current_location: about 190 miles E of Corpus Christi, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: moving west then turning west-southwest toward the south-central Texas coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: between Baffin Bay and Mesquite Bay, near Corpus Christi TX

weather_observation.watch_coast: None in effect – watches replaced by warnings
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Mesquite Bay to San Luis Pass, TX (includes Calhoun/Port O’Connor area)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Much of the Texas coast from Baffin Bay northward to High Island
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds (35–45 kt) possible Saturday afternoon and evening
weather_observation.storm_surge: 2–4 ft surge possible in Matagorda & San Antonio Bays causing minor coastal flooding
weather_observation.rainfall: 3–5 inches with isolated higher amounts, risk of flash flooding
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf/rip currents and a brief tornado possible
